p: Territory of Washington County of Spokane}ss

I hereby certify that I have executed the named warrant by asserting the same Ray Raymond therein named and have her now in my custody, and do not bring er into court by reason of agreement believe the prosecuting attorney and attorney for said defendant that on account of sickness of said defendand she need not be brought into court pending her application for a continuance.
Special Appointed by the court filed pretenses.
